title: Smartarget Facebook - Follow Us
longDescription:
Do you have a Facebook page? Our app Facebook - Follow Us allows you to tell your users about your profile so they can start following you.

Many e-commerce sites generate a lot of traffic from Facebook, so it's very important to recommend your users to follow you so you can retarget them on Facebook and make sure they get back to your website to buy something.

Facebook Follow Us will show non intrusive but yet very visible message to your users and recommend them to follow you.
author: TopSoft UG

products.title: Free
products.shortDescription: Limited features. Visible on homepage only.

products.title: Free Plus
products.shortDescription: No limitations. Visible on all pages. Still FREE!

categories.title: Social & Communication
categories.description: Apps that make it easier to communicate with your customers.

Follow these steps to complete integration:

3. Go to Integration and copy the User ID to the input text box to this page
